page.title: 15MICHAEL AND DOREEN MUSKETT
page.content: Michael and Doreen Muskett are a husband-and-wife team who have built up a large collection of historical musical instruments. They have nearly 300 instruments, some of which are originals and some of which are careful reproductions. They live in Bovingdon,but travel around the country giving concerts. These concerts are either based on one particular historical period or to show the development of particular instruments. They came to our school and gave us a concert called 'Flutes, Reeds and Whistles'. They travel around in a special motor-caravan which has been specially modified to store all their valuable instruments.
